1671030.name: RPG Maker MZ - Fantasy Heroine Character Pack 6
1671030.description:
From a manipulative Dark elf to fearless Shinsengumi-fighters and seductive Vampires, we've got your leading lady's needs covered! Whether you're looking to switch up your party dynamic or simply wish for more variety, you can't go wrong with any of the 8 characters featured in this collection!

Fantasy Heroine Character Pack 6 makes it easier than ever to integrate a new female character into your project by offering matching walking sprites, front-view battlers, facesets, bust-up images and animated SV battlers.

Inspired by both classic fantasy elements and a modern manga aesthetic, the characters in this pack are a fantastic addition to your growing library of creative resources!

Features:

* 8 characters (Dark elf, Glaive, Shinsengumi x 4, Vampire x 2) in 2 different outfits are in contents written below:
* 8 walking sprites in 2 outfits = 16 walking sprites
* Static 8 front-facing battlers x 13 variations in 2 outfits = 208＋alternative versions for 6 characters (6 x13) = total of 286 graphics!
* 8 Animated SV battlers in 2 outfits =16
* 8 facesets with 8 emotions in 2 outfits =128 graphics
* 8 portrait bust images with 8 emotions in 2 outfits =128 graphics
* BONUS: All of 8 characters in 2 outfits with large-scale full-character artwork =16 graphics
* This pack is for use in RPG Makers, Visual Novel games or the engine of your choice. However, you may not sell your created game if it’s made with game development software other than the RPG Maker franchise or Visual Novel Maker.
1671030.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
